description:
XSeries Program Overview

Data science is revolutionizing our world. In the Data Science and Analytics XSeries you will learn how statistics plays a central role, explore the principles of machine learning and importance of algorithms, and discuss enabling technologies including the rapidly growing Internet of Things.Â 
You should take this XSeries if you are seeking career advancement, want to understand what data science might do for your enterprise, or are just interested in learning how data is transforming society.

            
              
                
                  
                    
                    
                  
                  See more
                  
                    about Data Science and Analytics in Context
                  
                

                
                  
                    
                    
                  
                  Hide Learn how statistics plays a central role in the data science approach. Learn the principles of machine learning and the importance of algorithms. Discover the relationship between Big Data and the Internet of Things (IoT).
